meanings.definition: A substance or essence that underlies the individual qualities or properties of a thing.
meanings.sent1: The hypostases of the soil determine its fertility.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the hypostases of matter to understand its composition.
meanings.sent3: The hypostases of the cake ingredients magically combined to create a delicious dessert.
meanings.sent4: In the story, the hidden hypostases of the ancient artifact revealed its true power.
meanings.sent5: The mysterious hypostases of the potion made it irresistible to those who drank it.

meanings.definition: A fundamental or underlying principle or reality.
meanings.sent1: The hypostases of justice are crucial for a fair society.
meanings.sent2: Philosophers often discuss the hypostases of existence and being.
meanings.sent3: The hypostases of friendship include trust and loyalty.
meanings.sent4: The hypostases of truth shine brightly even in the darkest times.
meanings.sent5: Understanding the hypostases of nature helps us appreciate its beauty.
